attributes.action: urge China to allow Western media and independent investigators into TAR and Tibetan areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No media are allowed into Tibet.  There is certainty that recent protestors will be brutally treated, tortured and either killed or given long prison sentences.  It is vital that the situation be monitored, brutality countered and that the freedom of speech and religion be truly returned to Tibetans.

It is also vital that you meet H.H. the Dalai Lama in May and that this be made known in advance to the Chinese government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
